title: 6/9/17 - Obama Still Trying To Convince The World(Shannon Joy/ Erick Stackelbeck and more join Mike)
description:
Mike Opelka in for Glenn ...Breaking down the James Comey testimony with Dr. Wendy Patrick ...What mattered and what didn't in DC yesterday ...Juxtaprogressivism ...Speaker-to-be??...Barack Obama is still trying to convince the world that he saved the world when he was president ...Update on the fight against Common Core with Shannon Joy ....Rep. Louie Gohmert updates us on what's happening in Congress ...Time to lose hope in the GOP?...Erick Stakelbeck of the CUFI Watchman Project discusses possible terrorists in the US.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
